Sign of Guilt.name: Sign of Guilt
Sign of Guilt.flavor: You trace a magical glyph in the air. Your enemy cannot bear the sight of it as the magic evokes deep guilt, causing the enemy to waver in its attacks.
Sign of Guilt.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls, and if the target attacks and misses, it must make a melee basic attack against an enemy adjacent to it as a free action.

No Rest for the Wicked.name: No Rest for the Wicked
No Rest for the Wicked.flavor: You call forth souls from the Shadowfell. As foes strike you, the souls distract them with wailing.
No Rest for the Wicked.effect: When any enemy hits you before the end of your next turn, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends).

Sign of Penance.name: Sign of Penance
Sign of Penance.flavor: A glyph of penance appears before you and ignites. Divine fire leaps from it to enemies of weak will.
Sign of Penance.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage.
Sign of Penance.effect: Make a secondary attack that is an area burst 1 centered on the primary target.
Sign of Penance.secondaryTarget: Each creature in the burst other than the primary target
Sign of Penance.secondaryOnHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage, and the secondary target is slowed (save ends).
Sign of Penance.secondaryeffect: If the primary attack reduces the primary target to 0 hit points, the burst creates an area of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of the encounter.
